overview: The Salman family have four children, all boys. They are Bagus, the handsome who’s shy toward girls; Alim the troublemaker; Rizky who has low intelligence; and Vina, the pretty boy obsessed with K-Pop style. Both of their parents die in an accident when they’re picking up Alim from jail. The Salman children then have to be on their own.
title: I Love You Masbro
